content.html: new terf tactic: if they misgender you, ask what theirs is. when they reply, say “prove it.” dismiss everything they provide, anything they say. pressure them on proving it I’ve tried this multiple times and it always works

new terf tactic: if they misgender you, ask what theirs is. when they reply, say “prove it.”

dismiss everything they provide, anything they say. pressure them on proving it

I’ve tried this multiple times and it always works
